content: un modèle très simple qui ne nécessite pas d échantillon aussi je n en indique pas la fiche explicative est disponible sur ravelry et via mon blog de fil en aiguille 1 le châle terminé mesure 131 x 64 cm gauge is not crucial for this pattern so i do not mention it the pattern is available in ravelry and on my blog de fil en aiguille 2 now in french only for english language readers you can download the english diagram 3 meanwhile i m able to publish a full translation for the moment thanks to ana 4 i can give you an explanation about the pampilles before you have to make us termionology - 1 row double_crochet - 1 row half_double_crochet and single_crochet for the last border row with the pampilles above each motif form the pampille 1 single_crochet inserting the crochet hook under the 3 chain of the 1st row edge chain 5 insert hook in the 4th chain from hook and make one cluster with 5 treble 5 treble_crochet hook together on top of the cluster make 4 chain insert hook in the first chain and make 1 cluster with 4 treble_crochet now you have two clusters open like a shell with 1 space at the top of the remaining chain from the first 5 chain you flip one cluster over the other and have a pampille it looks like two hollow shells put together you can also see this tuto pom pom edge 5 i hope it s help the finished shawl is 131 x 64 cm and for those who prefer written patterns yarnishness as converted the diagram to words you can find them here 6 thank to her 1 http //de-fil-en-aiguille blogspot com/ 2 http //de-fil-en-aiguille blogspot com/ 3 http //www ravelry com/dl/eclatdusoleil-designs/8418 filename=pampilles___plume_english_diagram pdf 4 http //www ravelry com/people/mora4 5 http //onceuponapinkmoon blogspot fr/2013/09/pom-pom-edge html 6 http //www ravelry com/projects/yarnishness/plume
